ruleName: Missing Clinical Documentation Alert - High-Risk Procedures
ruleDesc: Alerts reviewers when high-risk procedures lack required clinical documentation

hintsAction.message: WARNING: High-risk procedure requires clinical documentation. Request complete medical records and operative notes before approval.

ruleName: Prior Authorization History Warning - Recent Denial
ruleDesc: Warns reviewers about members with recent denials or partial approvals

hintsAction.message: NOTICE: Member has recent denial or partial approval within last 90 days. Review previous determination and supporting documentation.

ruleName: High-Risk Member Alert - Multiple Chronic Conditions
ruleDesc: Identifies high-risk members with multiple chronic conditions requiring care coordination

hintsAction.message: ALERT: High-risk member with multiple chronic conditions (Diabetes, CHF, CAD, CKD). Consider care coordination and case management referral.

ruleName: Provider Network Status - Out of Network
ruleDesc: Alerts when specialist providers are out-of-network for benefit verification

hintsAction.message: INFO: Out-of-network specialist provider. Verify member benefits for out-of-network coverage and obtain gap exception if applicable.

ruleName: Duplicate Request Warning - Similar Request in Last 30 Days
ruleDesc: Detects potential duplicate authorization requests to prevent duplicate approvals

hintsAction.message: CAUTION: Possible duplicate request detected. Similar authorization submitted within last 30 days. Review member history to avoid duplicate approvals.

ruleDesc: Enforces Pennsylvania state-mandated benefit coverage requirements

hintsAction.message: INFO: Pennsylvania mandates coverage for physical therapy services up to 30 visits per year without prior authorization. Verify visit count before requiring PA.

ruleName: Billing Code Mismatch Alert - Diagnosis and Procedure Inconsistency
ruleDesc: Identifies inconsistencies between diagnosis and procedure codes

hintsAction.message: WARNING: Potential coding mismatch detected. Diagnosis code indicates joint pain, but service codes are for cardiac testing (ECG). Verify medical necessity and coding accuracy.
